name: Marionberry Kush
description: Like the fruit it is named for, Marionberry Kush is a delicious hybrid bred by Heroes of the Farm. A well-balanced cross of Raspberry Kush and Space Queen that puts off a full spectrum of fruity flavors, Marionberry Kush closely resembles her genetic “sister” Cinderella 99. There are six main phenotypes of Marionberry that all show a range of fruit flavors like passionfruit and raspberry. The aroma is smooth, sweet, and earthy with a sour twist. The effects are pronounced and uplift the mind almost immediately and then slowly relax the body without putting you to sleep.
descriptionPlain: Like the fruit it is named for, Marionberry Kush is a delicious hybrid bred by Heroes of the Farm. A well-balanced cross of Raspberry Kush and Space Queen that puts off a full spectrum of fruity flavors, Marionberry Kush closely resembles her genetic “sister” Cinderella 99. There are six main phenotypes of Marionberry that all show a range of fruit flavors like passionfruit and raspberry. The aroma is smooth, sweet, and earthy with a sour twist. The effects are pronounced and uplift the mind almost immediately and then slowly relax the body without putting you to sleep.
aka: Marion Berry Kush, Marionberry, Marrion Barry Kush

highlightedReviews.text: Great for people with Anxiety disorders.  I felt super happy and uplifted immediately and had zero paranoia or anxiety issues. in fact I went for a nice October cruise with the music up and Windows down.  great strain
Sticky, sweet, dense, and SO potent. Has been my main day smoke for weeks, and has quickly become one of my favorite strains. Rare, and always exceptional quality.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Conspiracy Kush, Starfighter, Sour Jack, Aurora Borealis, and Marionberry Kush
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another round of strains have been added to the Leafly Explorer as per your requests! We've highlighted five of our favorites, but there are plenty more to check out here. 
All right, you know what to do with these: indulge, rate, review, repeat!
   1. Conspiracy Kush
Characteristics of Conspiracy Kush:

70% indica
Cross between Obama Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Tangy citrus aroma with a peppery aftertaste
Cerebral activity followed by relaxing effects

   2. Starfighter
Characteristics of Starfighter:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Alien Tahoe OG and Lemon Alien Dawg
Breeder: Alien Genetics
Sweet citrus aroma
Potently uplifting effects

   3. Sour Jack
Characteristics of Sour Jack:

70% sativa
Cross between Sour Diesel and Jack Herer
Tropical, sweet aroma
Uplifting effects with a spark of energy
May help with fatigue and depression

   4. Aurora Borealis
Characteristics of Aurora Borealis:

75% indica
Cross between Northern Lights #10 with Skunk #1
Sweet, skunky aroma
May help with spasms, pain, and sleeplessness

   5. Marionberry Kush
Characteristics of Marionberry Kush:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Raspberry Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Passion fruit and raspberry aroma
Uplifting followed by relaxation

growInfo.growNotes:
6 main phenotypes - all with fruity aromas
	Deep greens and purple hues when exposed to low temperatures
	Top plants once early in development and support plants to avoid limbs from breaking
	Fast finisher, great for production
